Second UserStory: i want to #have# the #repository# to lift embargoes on the release date and set the access controls to the configuration set on item on that date.
First UserStory: i want to #have# the #repository# queue my collection for replication upon ingest to our remote storage site and to display the remote replication status in each item and component page in the staff interface.

Text.Second UserStory: #g16# as a digitalrecords archivist, i want to #have# the #repository# to lift embargoes on the release date and set the access controls to the configuration set on item on that date.
Text.First UserStory: #g16# as a collection curator, i want to #have# the #repository# queue my collection for replication upon ingest to our remote storage site and to display the remote replication status in each item and component page in the staff interface.

Second UserStory: i want to #have# #symplectic elements# to communicate
First UserStory: i want to #have# #symplectic elements# bidirectionally communicate and integrate with ddr

Text.Second UserStory: #g16# as a repoadmin, i want to #have# #symplectic elements# to communicate
Text.First UserStory: #g16# as a repoadmin, i want to #have# #symplectic elements# bidirectionally communicate and integrate with ddr, which  provide a fedora connector and emory is using a hidden fedora instance that hydra collects objects for.

Second UserStory: i want to #have# a #method# to add and remove individual people from deposit groups.
First UserStory: i want to #have# a #method# to batch ingest etds we receive from proquest.
